node.statement: PART 0 (Well-definedness and SUSY â€” ESTABLISHED): For all q > 0 real, the q-deformed supercharge Q_q = (1/3!)sqrt(2JN) sum C^j_{m1,m2,m3}(q) psi_{m1} psi_{m2} psi_{m3} satisfies Q_q^2 = 0 (by total antisymmetry of q-3j symbols via column-permutation symmetry + Grassmann property), Q_q^dagger is the true Hermitian adjoint (q-3j symbols are real for q > 0), and H_q = {Q_q, Q_q^dagger} >= 0. The q-bubble identity sum_{m1,m2} C^j(q)C^j(q) = delta/[2j+1]_q holds, and the q-9j symbol with all spins j (j odd) vanishes. These results are established in quantum_group_proof/ (nodes 1.1, 1.1.2, 1.1.4, 1.2.1, 1.2.4 validated).
